subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Duke’s Mike Krzyzewski and Louisville’s Rick Pitino will meet in the Midwest Region final, but it is the 1992 East Region title game for which they will be most remembered together.
snippet: Duke’s Mike Krzyzewski and Louisville’s Rick Pitino will meet in the Midwest Region final, but it is the 1992 East Region title game for which they will be most remembered together.
